segments.advisor_message: So, can you tell me your main financial objectives for us to work on together?
segments.client_message: Yeah, um, I really wanna save for my kids' college fund and maybe invest for retirement too.

segments.advisor_message: Got it! College funding and retirement. Are there any other topics you'd like to tackle today?
segments.client_message: Not really, just those two things for now. Thanks!
